name: Habitap
description:
This game was submitted for the 2016 One Button Jam!

Take the reins as a remote-piloted rover controller and continue the search for alien life! Select a mission name and begin your adventure! Enjoy this casual adventure / collection game on android.

Current Features:

Traverse randomly generated terrains (different every time) and search for specimens of life among the rocks. Take your specimens to the nearest lab to earn mission value and unlock upgrades for your rover!

Future Aspirations:

Add additional terrain details / types including things like randomly generated flora / fauna. Potentially add in un-lockable rovers and persisting upgrades through multiple play-throughs.
